tier.item: (1) Direct passive ( English passive) (Kubo 1992: (1)) - henceforth, numbers only
Taro-no yuuki-ga ookuno hito-ni tatae-rare-ta. (cf. Ookuno hito-ga Taro-no yuuki-o tatae-ta.)
`Taro's courage was praised by many people.'
